website_summaries.verdict: Choose these unique cookies if  the idea of mint Oreos appeals to you. Refreshing taste.
pros: Those who enjoy the combination of chocolate and mint can't get enough of these mint creme and chocolate cookies
They also have a decent amount of filling
cons: Several packages arrived with broken or stale cookies

customer_reviews.title: Coffee and these cookies are my drug of choice!f
customer_reviews.text: I love these cookies. I've found it so convenient to get them so quickly from Amazon. I read one review discribing them as chocolate cookies with tooth paste filling. That's just so not true. I like to put one in my mouth and take a swig of hot coffee. Love it! All of those flavors just please me. It may not be for everyone, but it's my idea of a good time. LOL
customer_reviews.author: gwenwalker

customer_reviews.title: All but three cookies were broken, some are mostly crumbs
customer_reviews.text: Received the cookies today. Since I have been trying to stay away from as many snacks as I usually eat, I haven't had any cookies in months. So you might say I was looking forward to these. After I opening them to see all but three cookies were broken, I was a bit disappointed but figured what the heck at least they will taste fine. Unfortunately, they taste stale and don't have the same crunch you get with Oreos. The fact that they were all broken makes it odd that they were stale also but they were. I checked the expiration date, and it is for Sept of 2019 so should have still been good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Case of the Missing Cookies!
customer_reviews.text: My Mint Creame Oreo cookies 15.25 oz. JUST arrived and EIGHT cookies were missing!!! This is madness !!I’ve been an Amazon customer for several years and (thank goodness) just twice I’ve experienced something like this!! Who can solve The Case of the Missing Cookies?!
customer_reviews.author: ~~Amy A~~

customer_reviews.title: Thin Greasy Mint Filling This Batch
customer_reviews.text: Something was wrong with this batch. The filling was just oozing out of the cookies when serving and attempting to eat 😕. Chilling didn't help much and shouldn't be melty in 65 degree environment. Will be checking with company about recalls.
customer_reviews.author: Tell It Like It T I Is !

customer_reviews.title: Chocolatey crunchy minty, and in fresh condition
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, these are good. Right now if you made me choose between eating these and eating normal Oreos for the rest of my life, I'd go with the mint ones. The mint flavor is just right - noticeable, but not too strong. The package arrived in normal condition with a March 2016 expiration date. I really liked the pull-tab resealable opening - so much easier than the old days, and the cookies stay fresher. Mint fun fact: you can easily grow all the mint you need since the plant grows so quickly. If you'd like more info about Prime Pantry bestsellers, click on my name (PPantryReviews) to check out my website.
customer_reviews.author: PPantryReviews

customer_reviews.title: Just ONCE I'd like to get a package that isn;t full of broken and crushed cookies!
customer_reviews.text: But I suppose that getting it from Amazon's WIDE selection of buyers and re-sellers is like asking that a car I buy actually have filled tires or oi in the crankcase.... I never have gotten a single package of cookies from Amazon that didn't have at least half of them broken. This time it was the entire package! I don't eat cookies with a scoop....nor shovel them into my milk...
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious - They are absolutely my weakness. I would eat the entire package if my wife didn't finally take them away. To me - these taste almost as good as Girl Scout Thin Mints. They are 70 calories a cookie - and probably responsible for more than a few extra inches around my waistline, but they are just great. I love them - the kids love them. They're great.
customer_reviews.author: Our Big Active Family

customer_reviews.title: Tasty cookie crumbs??
customer_reviews.text: A good 1/3 of my cookies arrived smashed as they were packaged on the edge of the box, facing outward. A bummer. Packaging was not compromised though, so they were still edible. Taste-wise, they're one of my favorite Oreo flavors. I've buy these in person rather than have them shipped in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Chutuk

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are bad. Glass of milk and a brand new package. Almost ate a whole row in one sitting. Not as good as Girl Scouts thin mints, but so close. Hhmm, maybe I need a couple more...
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with Oreos!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the Oreo Mint Thins, but this is all that was available when I purchased. Overall the same, but more min cream inside. They are delicious either way. Can’t go wrong with Oreos. I also mixed some into my chocolate ice cream. Yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Jax

customer_reviews.title: They're better, and available year round
customer_reviews.text: I thought Girl Scout "Thin Mints" ruled the cookie universe.....then i found these! They're better, and available year round. <drooling ggghhhhhggg drool>
customer_reviews.author: MrBlack

customer_reviews.title: W O W.... One of the best tasting Oreos EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just amazingly Yummmmmmm.... Wow I'm addicted.... ugh I just love these Oreos.... Good Lord Help Me Restrain....lol...
customer_reviews.author: C.B.D.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I like regular Oreo's, but LOVE these mint additions! So glad they didn't make it a limited or seasonal edition item. Great mixed in with vanilla ice cream and milk.
customer_reviews.author: Bronco Princess

customer_reviews.title: Go To Oreo Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I liked the mint flavor. When you want an Oreo that has really good flavoring to the filling this is the cookie flavor to go to. It's minty fresh and it tastes good with the chocolate cookie.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Sbeih

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: The cream in the middle is too sweet. My wife just takes them out. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: S-N-D

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Oreo
customer_reviews.text: I love the Mint Oreo’s. They are my favorites of all Oreo’s made.
customer_reviews.author: Nlwright0408

customer_reviews.title: Good oreos
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friend and she ate it all, so I'm assuming it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Came all broken
customer_reviews.text: This product taste good the one is because they were all broken and not eligible for return:(
customer_reviews.author: Laura Neila

customer_reviews.title: Tip order more than one bag these are good
customer_reviews.text: These taste so good the only issue I have is they don't put enough in the bag I ran out in 2 days
customer_reviews.author: Lordzables

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: They were stale, crumbley and dry. I won’t be ordering any more food online.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used in an Oreo challenge - one of the favored flavors
customer_reviews.author: J C M

customer_reviews.title: OREO FOR ALL AGES.
customer_reviews.text: Great with milk. Good for a Santa treat with egg nog on Christmas Eve. 5 is a serving size.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This cookie tastes Really Good and so glad I tried it. Love the Mint Cream and the cookie is always good.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Oreo mint perfection
customer_reviews.text: Greatest creation for a mint fan. Tastes so good with milk.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Sabin

customer_reviews.title: Oreo's are the best !
customer_reviews.text: Oreo's is excellent in making my days a lot better with a glass of milk
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Bad Delivery!!
customer_reviews.text: all of my Oreos arrived broken or smashed!! Not happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Verbeck

customer_reviews.title: These are good. They will remind you of thin mints
customer_reviews.text: These are good. They will remind you of thin mints, but with a healthy dose of cream. I was surprised by the amount of cream in these. These are pretty much double or triple stuffed in terms of the amount of cream. Really awesome with milk.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Little broken but not bad
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical ordering cookies from Amazon as I was pretty sure they'd arrive as crumbs. I was pleasantly surprised that only a few of the cookies were broken. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Tyler N

customer_reviews.title: Oreos are the best!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these. So I keep him in good supply
customer_reviews.author: Donell Turner

customer_reviews.title: Better than Girl Scout Thin Mints
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! I hope they don't stop making these!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my mint Oreo's maybe too much. Have a hard time sharing these. Always nice and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: ndfreshair2

customer_reviews.title: Mint Oreos are good.
customer_reviews.text: It has mint. Thought I'd try this since a few weeks ago I got the thin version. I will be buying the thin from now on. This was a favorite, but the thin oreos are better.
customer_reviews.author: Wino

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: These were super stale! Usually one of my favorites but wasn't happy with this order
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: A bit like toothpaste.
customer_reviews.text: It's not the worst, but I wouldn't buy them again,
customer_reviews.author: Yubire O.

customer_reviews.title: Minty
customer_reviews.text: These are Great and Small quantities as a novelty but they are no replacement for the original Oreo.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: I like this product.
customer_reviews.text: I buy this often and usually get a good price. The Postal Carrier has to back his truck to the garage to offload, I buy so much.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great with milk...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent with milk, my favorite Oreos right next to the peanut butter ones. some complained about the flavor being like tooth paste but I didn't taste that at all, they remind me of thin mints.
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: A Special Oreo Treat
customer_reviews.text: Almost as good as the ones the “girls” sell annually. Love the combination!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Scharf

customer_reviews.title: Oreos mint cookies
customer_reviews.text: Too much cream, they didn’t stay together, the cream fell out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best Oreos ever. Except for the chocolate covered mint Oreos.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Peck

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL..
customer_reviews.text: What else is there to say about mint and chocolate together. WONDERFUL..
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Packed with good amount of frosting with a rich mint taste
customer_reviews.text: Never having these before, I bought them out of curiosity. Packed with good amount of frosting with a rich mint taste, they're a good adage to the Oreo line.
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these but our grocery store only has them at Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: They are OREO's, with mint filling! How can they be anything less than delicious.
customer_reviews.author: CaretakerCT

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like an Andes candy
customer_reviews.text: These cookies, dipped in moo are quite dangerous for the waistline. Trust me on this buy more than one.
customer_reviews.author: KenSueCreative

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the Oreo Mint Creme Cookies. We bought the thin ones but plan to try the large ones also.
customer_reviews.author: Octogen

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is the best
customer_reviews.text: They made delicious holiday cream cheese oreo balls dipped in white chocolate!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping practice.
customer_reviews.text: The product was very tasty, but it was shipped to me in a soft shipping bag. The result was mostly broken cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Gomery

customer_reviews.title: Great cookies
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I didn't like the red velvet ones but I love these.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Milk's favorite cookie!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite flavors of Oreos. Only wish pantry offered the chocolate ones as well.
customer_reviews.author: TerryM

customer_reviews.title: Pantry crumbles
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Pantry item. My box wasn't packed admirably, and several items were partly crushed. Quite udible and tasty, but a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Heaven in a cookie. Just like the Girl Scout Thin Mints, but with a different texture. I LOVE these!
customer_reviews.author: Livelovelaugh

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely awesome with hot chocolate - wonderful for snowy, winter nights
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: you cant go wrong with these especially if you are a fan of mint
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Mmmmmm so good. Dip it in milk. Better than any other cookie.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Burns

customer_reviews.title: They are good, it must be an oreo packaging issue everytime ...
customer_reviews.text: They are good, it must be an oreo packaging issue everytime I buy them whether here or at store they are all broken apart.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the thin cookie eat a couple and your good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well, they're Oreos. Tasty mint, at that ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, they're Oreos. Tasty mint, at that. Rating the shipping more than anything else; cookies arrived intact and, amazingly, none broken.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: So good, but inly if you enjoy mint and chocolate, is a strong flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Castillo Tejada

customer_reviews.title: Gift basket
customer_reviews.text: Part of a newborn gift basket I put together (included gifts for the baby, mom and daddy. (Baby did not eat ;-)
customer_reviews.author: SKP

customer_reviews.title: Unique and delightful
customer_reviews.text: Yummy and a nice change! Ofcourse DONT forget your dunking milk 🥛
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Yummy good chocolate and mint flavor one of my favorite oreos
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: So delicious! My favorite Oreo after the seasonal peppermint. I love to eat them after they've been thoroughly chilled in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: dragonflygrl

customer_reviews.title: Not much bad can be said about Oreos but oh my are ...
customer_reviews.text: Not much bad can be said about Oreos but oh my are these good. We can never find these at a local store so I was very happy to see them here. I got these to dip in chocolate for Christmas gift plates. I got several different flavors of Oreos and to be able to tell which ones were which we sprinkled green sugar on the mint ones, red sugar on the red velvet types and sprinkles on the chocolate Oreos. These made such a nice looking cookie plate I'm sure I will do it again next year.
customer_reviews.author: grandmax5

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite!!!! Hope the quality and everything remains the same as it is now in the future. I understand the company is moving to Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite. I like these better then any other flavor:
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: No longer need to wait for a girl scout!
customer_reviews.text: Thin mints get out of the way there's a new treat in town!
customer_reviews.author: Mesha

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these! They disappear quickly in our household!

customer_reviews.title: Thin Mints in Oreo form
customer_reviews.text: These Oreos taste like thin mints, so if you're a fan of those, you will definitely enjoy these.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: They love them thank you
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these to fill the break room with for the guys. They love them thank you!
customer_reviews.author: UH60Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Love chocolate and mint cookies; these do the job until next Girl Scount cookie time.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were so good. Couldn't stop eating them. Love the mint flavor.
customer_reviews.author: CmGm47

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes they did meet the expectations of my visiting grandkids Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Monica Weltmann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best type of Oreo hands down, nothing else to say!
customer_reviews.author: Logan T.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cookies with the minty middle!! Great substitute for thin mints. I may even like these better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes just like I was expecting! Minty and good (could be comparable to a thin mint)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to trying these. BIG disappointment. "Mint" has odd taste, besides very imitation. Cookie part is typical crunchy, tasty Oreo but that's ruined by the green slime between the cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: I like all Oreos but this isn't a stand alone one
customer_reviews.text: I like all Oreos but this isn't a stand alone one, it would be good crushedi with mint chocolate chip ice cream but by itself it isnt my favourite.
customer_reviews.author: W. Stinnett

customer_reviews.title: Where's the mint?
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an acquired taste. Lacking on mint. Cookies don't last long in my home...these have. Don't expect any taste close to Thin Mints
customer_reviews.author: Loves2read

customer_reviews.title: These taste like minty toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: Now, this is a subjective review. I did not enjoy these cookies at all. The mint flavor tasted artificial and pasty. The cookies break apart quickly if you try to separate them manually like you can do with other Oreo cookies. I've had a package that lasted so long uneaten by family members that I eventually threw it away. These are really not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mihalis in Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We're not the quality I'm use too from Oreos! No one would eat them not even the grand children!
customer_reviews.author: Elve Kay Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Danger, Danger, Will Robinson... These cookies are so good you'll find it hard to stop eating them.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really a regular Oreo cookie fan. I've bought them once and was not impressed. But I decided to try the mint flavor type. Oh my, they are the best. If you like mint and chocolate ice cream, you get a good idea of what these cookies are like. Nabisco hit a home run with these. I'm a fan. If you try them, make sure you grab a few and put the package away. Once you start to eat them it's hard to stop. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Wheels at Large

customer_reviews.title: Just as delicious as I expected
customer_reviews.text: As a huge fan of mint chocolate chip ice cream, and a life long Oreo cookie lover, these cookies are a dream come true. The Oreo Mint Creme cookies are just as tasty as original Oreo cookies, with the deep chocolate taste and creamy filling, but with a delicious taste of mint instead of the plain vanilla flavor. Amazon Prime Pantry offers these at a great price, around$2 less than my local grocery store. The only negative about these cookies are that they are incredibly addicting. After eating one I couldn't put them down and ate half a row! Of course, a glass of cold milk is the perfect accompaniment to these Mint Creme cookies.
customer_reviews.author: HelloReese

customer_reviews.title: Mint Creme Oreo
customer_reviews.text: WOW, Nabisco did it again with these oreo's. They are coming out with so many flavors it is getting harder and harder to pick out what flavor to get. I am not sure which oreo I like better for an after dinner refreshing treat, these mint or the lemon. The mint isn't an overpowering mint, it is just perfect and with the chocolate, well it's just like heaven!
customer_reviews.author: Trish Kolbe

customer_reviews.title: Too much crème
customer_reviews.text: My complaint is not with the flavors (choc/mint) as others have noted. My gripe is that this has about 150 percent of the crème of the classic oreo. I don't need, want or like that. Even as a kid I was never a "double-stuf" fan. I've never once eaten a standard Oreo and thought "That was nice, but I wish they'd increase the crème, so it would coat my tongue with overly-sweetened, oily fat." They put too much crème in these. It's not nice. Market that rubbish to people who like it (as Double-Stuf), and go back to the right proportion for everyone else. I'll just buy Mint Newman O's next time.
customer_reviews.author: tierny

customer_reviews.title: So good old dogs steal them
customer_reviews.text: My dog took the entire unopened package off of the dining room table, opened it and are every last crumb. Judging purely by my dogs reaction, I can only assume that these are the most amazing cookies ever.
customer_reviews.author: KDubbs

customer_reviews.title: Try putting these in the freezer! Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: These are SO yummy! The trick I learned from an old friend is putting them in the freezer. It tastes really yummy that way! I love the mint tasting cream that goes perfect with the chocolate cookie outside. :D
customer_reviews.author: SweetPea83

customer_reviews.title: College Midterms
customer_reviews.text: Sent as part of a college care package during midterm time these were very well received! Also since they are not Oreos he could just run to the store to buy they were that little extra sent with love from Mom kind of surprise gift.
customer_reviews.author: TheBowdensTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Yummm!
customer_reviews.text: These Oreo cookies were delicious! They tastes almost like traditional Oreo cookies, but with a hint of mint. Yummm! The filling amount is standard, and the coloring is green enough to be cute for St. Patrick's Day.
customer_reviews.author: noone

customer_reviews.title: I liked them far too much
customer_reviews.text: I liked them far too much. . . I ate the whole bag in 3 days. I cannot have them in my house again. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kistmyst

customer_reviews.title: Cream and cookie don't stick together as well as I would like.
customer_reviews.text: Mint is good, but the cookie and cream separate too easily. Most comes separated while lifting out of the bag. I like to twist them. So satisfying that way!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: So yummy.
customer_reviews.text: Yum yum yum yum. If you love Oreos and live thin mints this is a no brainer
customer_reviews.author: auntstacy

customer_reviews.title: So glad I did they have great prices and deliver straight ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these oreos through the prime pantry to try out this service. So glad I did they have great prices and deliver straight to your door. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you love mint and oreos then you'll love these. I might have to order more
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: This is the only special flavour I like. Not too powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Ben L.

customer_reviews.title: Bad mint
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the mint cream. I won't purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kinner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Oreos and these are fantastic, especially since they are double stuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Addictive but ...
customer_reviews.text: My mouth got super sticky after eating a bunch of these. The minty taste made my throat a bit itchy. I will stick to the regular flavor..
customer_reviews.author: Becky W

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Mint flavor is obviously the last one you might try... i mean Oreo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: OREO Mint Creme Chocolate Sandwich Cookies, 15.2 oz
product_meta.description:
Take a delicious break with OREO Mint Creme Chocolate Sandwich Cookies, a refreshing twist on America's favorite sandwich cookie. Supremely dunkable, these OREO cookies sandwich a rich mint flavored creme filling between the bold taste of two chocolate wafer cookies--making them milk's favorite cookie. OREO Mint Creme Chocolate Sandwich Cookies are great for serving at parties, packing in school lunches, or mixing into your favorite dessert recipe. The resealable cookie pack with easy-pull tab keeps your cookie snacks fresh and is perfect for snacking, sharing, or traveling.

 * One 15.2 oz package of OREO Mint Creme Chocolate Sandwich Cookies
 * Chocolate wafers filled with delicious mint flavored creme
 * Sandwich cookies are perfectly dunkable
 * Perfect for sharing and entertaining
 * Resealable package helps keep these sweet snacks fresh






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :3.94 x 3.94 x 3.94 inches; 1.1 Pounds
 * Item model number :00044000025427
 * Date First Available :April 2, 2015
 * Manufacturer :ORMT9
 * ASIN :B00VJYSGAM

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars578 ratings Take a delicious break with OREO Mint Creme Chocolate Sandwich Cookies, a refreshing twist on America's favorite sandwich cookie. Supremely dunkable, these OREO cookies sandwich a rich mint flavored creme filling between the bold taste of two chocolate wafer cookies--making them milk's favorite cookie. OREO Mint Creme Chocolate Sandwich Cookies are great for serving at parties, packing in school lunches, or mixing into your favorite dessert recipe. The resealable cookie pack with easy-pull tab keeps your cookie snacks fresh and is perfect for snacking, sharing, or traveling.

 * One 15.2 oz package of OREO Mint Creme Chocolate Sandwich Cookies
 * Chocolate wafers filled with delicious mint flavored creme
 * Sandwich cookies are perfectly dunkable
 * Perfect for sharing and entertaining
 * Resealable package helps keep these sweet snacks fresh
